user_instruction: 'Provide Alex with some feedback on his project via email (alex@student.university.edu). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request to Email Feedback to Alex on His Project

Hi Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please review the notes you’ve stored in Gmail and NotionManager for Alex’s project and send him detailed feedback at alex@student.university.edu? It would be helpful if you could cover key strengths, areas for improvement, and any next steps he should take.

Thank you very much for your time and support!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:

Best regards,
